series_description: This series documents the complaint, investigation, hearing, and disposition of a disciplinary case when a sanction is imposed. This series may include, but is not limited to: forms, pleadings, briefs, affidavits, reports, and correspondence. of Va Sup Ct: Part 6, ยง 4, 13-9 (B)

This series documents the complaint, investigation, hearing, and disposition of a disciplinary case that is dismissed. This series may include, but is not limited to: forms, pleadings, affidavits, reports, and correspondence. Rules of Va Sup Ct: Part 6, ยง 4, 13-9 (B)

This series documents the final decisions rendered through Virginia State Bar Disciplinary System, including district committee determinations. This series may include, but is not limited to: determinations and orders. Rules of Va Sup Ct: Part 6, ยง 4, 13-9 (D)
